name: LBPManager
description: LBPManager contract. Smart contract for managing interactions with a Balancer LBP.

eventDecorators.name: FeeTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a user has withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: LBPManagerAdminChanged
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a user has withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: MetadataUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a user has withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: PoolTokensWithdrawn
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a user has withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: getSwapEnabled
functionDecorators.description: Tells whether swaps are enabled or not for the LBP.

functionDecorators.name: initializeLBP
functionDecorators.description: Subtracts the fee, deploys the LBP and adds liquidity to it.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The address that receives the feePercentage.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenList
parameterDecorators.description: Array containing two addresses in order of: 1. The address of the project token being distributed. 2. The address of the funding token being exchanged for the project token.

parameterDecorators.name: _amounts
parameterDecorators.description: Array containing two parameters in order of: 1. The amounts of project token to be added as liquidity to the LBP. 2. The amounts of funding token to be added as liquidity to the LBP.

parameterDecorators.name: _startWeights
parameterDecorators.description: Array containing two parametes in order of: 1. The start weight for the project token in the LBP. 2. The start weight for the funding token in the LBP.

parameterDecorators.name: _startTimeEndTime
parameterDecorators.description: Array containing two parameters in order of: 1. Start time for the LBP. 2. End time for the LBP.

parameterDecorators.name: _endWeights
parameterDecorators.description: Array containing two parametes in order of: 1. The end weight for the project token in the LBP. 2. The end weight for the funding token in the LBP.

parameterDecorators.name: _fees
parameterDecorators.description: Array containing two parameters in order of: 1. Percentage of fee paid for every swap in the LBP. 2. Percentage of fee paid to the _beneficiary for providing the service of the LBP Manager.

parameterDecorators.name: _metadata
parameterDecorators.description: IPFS Hash of the LBP creation wizard information.

functionDecorators.name: projectTokensRequired
functionDecorators.description: Get required amount of project tokens to cover for fees and the actual LBP.

functionDecorators.name: removeLiquidity
functionDecorators.description: Exit pool or remove liquidity from pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _receiver
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the liquidity receiver, after exiting the LBP.

parameterDecorators.name: _metadata
parameterDecorators.description: LBP wizard contract metadata, that is an IPFS Hash.

parameterDecorators.name: _receiver
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the BPT tokens receiver.
